snippet.title: Duck Doom Deluxe
snippet.description:
I like this game.

It's a fusion between Duck Hunt and Doom created by a GameMaker user to whom I think is named "HelpTheWretched".  

http://gmc.yoyogames.com/?showtopic=81168

Well anyway, this was created using Game Maker 5 and it features the classic gameplay of Duck Hunt with most of the weapons of Doom 2.  The combination makes the overall gameplay very enjoyable.
